Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and place a 12-cup muffin tin in the oven to preheat along with it.
Beat the eggs and milk together in a bowl using an electric hand mixer. Mix in the flour and salt until a smooth batter forms.
Cover bottom and sides of muffin cups halfway with the batter.
Bake until the popovers are puffed and golden, about 30 to 35 minutes. Avoid opening the oven during baking.
